TextEng: Oh! I wasn't expecting any visitors. Are you here to see my husband? I'm afraid he's out of the city right now.
Text: 어머! 손님이 오실 줄 몰랐어요. 남편을 만나러 오신 건가요? 아쉽게도 지금 도시를 비우셨는데.

TextEng: Fare you well. Perhaps we'll speak again.
Text: 안녕히 가세요. 다음에 또 이야기해요.

TextEng: Yes, yes. On your way, then.
Text: 네, 네. 그럼 가세요.

TextEng: Begone and good riddance.
Text: 꺼져요. 잘됐네.

TextEng: Mmm. I see.
Text: 음. 알겠어요.

TextEng: I'd be delighted to answer your questions. What do you wish?
Text: 기꺼이 질문에 답해 드릴게요. 뭘 원하세요?

TextEng: *Sigh* You came in my home to question me? All right, go ahead.
Text: (한숨) 남의 집에 들어와서 심문하시겠다고요? 좋아요, 어서 해봐요.

TextEng: I'd rather you left my home, please. I didn't invite you, after all. So, if there's nothing pressing...
Text: 제 집에서 나가 주시면 좋겠어요. 초대한 적도 없잖아요. 급한 일이 아니라면...

TextEng: Welcome to my home. Is there something I can do for you, <sir/madam>?
Text: 제 집에 오신 걸 환영해요. 도와드릴 일이 있나요?

TextEng: I don't remember inviting you into my home. What do you want?
Text: 제 집에 초대한 기억이 없는데요. 뭘 원하세요?

TextEng: I am the Lady Jadale. My husband is out of the city, right now, however. Is there something I can do for you?
Text: 전 자데일 부인이에요. 하지만 남편은 지금 도시를 비우셨어요. 도와드릴 일이 있나요?

TextEng: You know about the ring Erbie gave me? Oh... Erbie must have sent you, I guess. Well I don't think what he's asking is very fair!
Text: 어브가 준 반지 얘기를 아세요? 아... 어브가 보낸 거군요. 글쎄요, 그 사람 요구는 공평하지 않다고 생각해요!

TextEng: Erbie's just being silly. He gave me his ring because he loves me, and I'm not giving it back because that hasn't changed!
Text: 어브는 그냥 바보같이 구는 거예요. 절 사랑해서 반지를 줬고, 그건 변하지 않았으니 돌려주지 않을 거예요!

TextEng: Again? (sigh) We already talked about this. I don't know why you insist on hounding me.
Text: 또요? (한숨) 이미 그 얘기 했잖아요. 왜 자꾸 졸라대시는지 모르겠네요.

TextEng: Why would you want to do that? I gave Erbie's ring to you already.
Text: 왜 그러시려고요? 어브의 반지는 이미 드렸잖아요.

TextEng: Now, if there's nothing else I can do for you...
Text: 이제, 더 도와드릴 일이 없다면...

TextEng: Oh... but I don't have Erbie's ring anymore.
Text: 아... 하지만 어브의 반지는 더 이상 없어요.

TextEng: I gave it to someone else already. I'm sorry. Is there something else you wanted?
Text: 다른 사람한테 이미 줬어요. 죄송해요. 다른 건 없으세요?

TextEng: I suppose there's no harm in that... it is just a nice bauble, after all. Fine... you want the ring? I'll sell it to you. For 1000 gp.
Text: 그래도 괜찮겠죠... 그냥 예쁜 장신구일 뿐이니까요. 좋아요... 반지를 원하세요? 팔게요. 금화 1000에.

TextEng: What?! How dare you speak so to a lady! You take that back right now or I'll have my guards throw you out of here!
Text: 뭐라고요?! 감히 귀부인한테 그런 말을! 당장 취소하세요, 안 그러면 경비원들한테 쫓아내게 할 거예요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh, all right. I don't really want it around anymore, anyhow... it would just remind me of Erbie.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 아, 좋아요. 어차피 더 이상 갖고 있기도 싫었어요... 어브 생각만 날 테니까.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> *Sigh* How about 400 gp, then?
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> (한숨) 그럼 금화 400은 어때요?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Hmph. The price is 1000 gp. If you don't like it, then you know where the door is.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 흥. 가격은 금화 1000이에요. 싫으시면 문이 어딘지 아시잖아요.

TextEng: Just give me a moment...
Text: 잠깐만요...

TextEng: Hmph. You want it that badly, then fine... though I doubt Erbie will pay you that much for it. But I don't care what he does anymore.
Text: 흥. 그렇게 원하시면 좋아요... 어브가 그만큼 주진 않을 것 같지만. 뭐, 그 사람이 뭘 하든 이제 상관없어요.

TextEng: No, I'm not... ! (sigh) Fine. I don't really want this thing around anyhow. 250 gold pieces and it's yours.
Text: 아뇨, 전...! (한숨) 좋아요. 어차피 이거 갖고 있기도 싫었어요. 금화 250에 드릴게요.

TextEng: I'm not going to sell it, if that's what you mean. There is no price you can put on my love for Erbie!
Text: 팔진 않을 거예요. 어브에 대한 제 사랑에는 가격을 매길 수 없어요!

TextEng: Well! I suppose you are out of luck, then. The price is 1000 gold, no lower.
Text: 그래요! 그럼 운이 없으신 거네요. 가격은 금화 1000이고, 더 내리진 않을 거예요.

TextEng: Hmph. You don't even have that little bit of gold? Are you a pauper? Anyway... the price isn't going any lower. It is my ring, after all.
Text: 흥. 그 정도 금화도 없으세요? 거지예요? 어쨌든... 더 내리진 않을 거예요. 제 반지잖아요.

TextEng: Well if you don't even have 400 gold to spare, I can't help you. Haggle all you want, that's as low as I'll go.
Text: 금화 400도 없으시다면, 도와드릴 수가 없네요. 아무리 깎으셔도, 이게 최저예요.

TextEng: Here it is. Take it and go... I'm sure we don't have anything else to discuss.
Text: 여기요. 가져가시고 나가세요... 더 할 얘기는 없을 거예요.

TextEng: What -? Where is it? My ring is gone! I've been robbed!!!
Text: 뭐...? 어디 갔어? 반지가 없어졌어! 도둑 맞았어!!!

TextEng: You! You were involved in this, weren't you?! Erbie sent you to distract me so someone else could steal it!
Text: 당신! 당신도 한패죠?! 어브가 당신을 보내서 날 정신 팔리게 하고 다른 사람이 훔치게 했구나!

TextEng: For all I know, Erbie may not even have sent you! Well... I'm going to teach you a lesson! I'm keeping your gold!
Text: 어쩌면 어브가 보낸 것도 아닐지 몰라! 좋아요... 혼내줄게요! 당신 금화는 내가 가질 거예요!

TextEng: Fine! Now get out of my home. I'm sure you know where the door is.
Text: 좋아요! 이제 제 집에서 나가세요. 문이 어딘지 아시잖아요.

TextEng: How dare you threaten me after all this! I'll teach you a lesson you won't soon forget! Guards!!
Text: 이 모든 일 후에 감히 나를 협박해?! 절대 잊지 못할 교훈을 줄 테야! 경비원!!

TextEng: Fair? Don't talk to me about fair! I've just been robbed of my precious ring - and I know you were involved somehow!
Text: 공평? 공평 타령 하지 마세요! 소중한 반지를 막 도둑맞았는데요 - 당신도 어떻게든 연루된 거 알아요!

TextEng: Talk about what? I don't think there's anything to discuss.
Text: 무슨 얘기요? 논의할 게 없는 것 같은데요.

TextEng: You... you must be joking! I've never heard of such a thing!
Text: 당신... 농담하시는 거죠! 그런 건 들어본 적도 없어요!

TextEng: Well, I don't think that's very funny.
Text: 글쎄요, 별로 재미없는 것 같은데요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh no! I... I... you can have the ring! I didn't mean to do anything wrong!
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 맙소사! 저... 저... 반지 가지세요! 나쁜 짓을 하려던 게 아니에요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> That's the most absurd thing I've ever heard. I don't believe for a second that you're with the garrison!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 지금까지 들어본 것 중 제일 황당해요. 당신이 수비대 소속이라는 거 1초도 안 믿어요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> What?! But... what does that mean?
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 뭐라고요?! 하지만... 그게 무슨 뜻이에요?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Don't be absurd! Even if such a law existed, it wouldn't matter *now,* with all this fighting.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 말도 안 돼요! 그런 법이 있다고 해도, 이렇게 싸움이 벌어지고 있는 *지금*은 상관없잖아요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh no! My poor Erbie! All right, then, have it your way! You can have the ring... you leave him alone!
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 맙소사! 불쌍한 어브! 좋아요, 당신 뜻대로 해요! 반지 가져가요... 어브는 건드리지 마세요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Oh, that's fine! My husband has plenty of coin, he... oh. Wait. (sigh) That won't work.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 아, 괜찮아요! 남편이 돈이 많아서, 그가... 아. 잠깐. (한숨) 그건 안 되겠네.

TextEng: I guess... I guess I shall have to return the ring.
Text: 그러면... 그러면 반지를 돌려줘야겠네요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I... guess you're right. That wasn't very nice of him.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 저... 맞는 것 같아요. 그 사람 참 못됐네요.

TextEng: I should keep the ring, then. It's pretty... and that pig of a gnome doesn't deserve it back!
Text: 그럼 반지는 내가 갖고 있어야겠어요. 예쁘잖아요... 그 돼지 같은 노움은 돌려받을 자격이 없어요!

TextEng: Oh, if he even notices it at all. First he would have to come home. Hmph. Erbie is just over-reacting.
Text: 아, 남편이 알아채기나 하려나. 일단 집에 와야 할 텐데. 흥. 어브는 그냥 과민반응하는 거예요.

TextEng: I don't know. Maybe he loves me so much that it scares him? Erbie is so sweet.
Text: 모르겠어요. 아마 너무 사랑해서 무서운 거 아닐까요? 어브는 참 다정해요.

TextEng: That's very rude of you, you know.
Text: 참 무례하시네요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> You're right. It's a gaudy thing, anyway. I'll give you the ring, then, if you'll throw it in his face.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 맞아요. 어차피 촌스러운 물건이에요. 그럼 반지 드릴게요, 그 사람 얼굴에 던져주세요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Hah! I get expensive gifts all the time from my husband, don't I? The ring is mine, now.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 하! 남편한테 비싼 선물 늘 받잖아요, 안 그래요? 반지는 이제 제 거예요.

TextEng: Well, no... no, of course I don't want Erbie hurt!
Text: 글쎄, 아뇨... 아뇨, 당연히 어브가 다치는 건 원치 않아요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> He... doesn't? But, I... oh! There's someone else, isn't there? He wants to... give the ring to someone else! That pig!
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 그가... 안 그렇다고요? 하지만, 저는... 아! 다른 여자가 있죠? 반지를... 다른 여자한테 주려는 거죠! 이 돼지 같으니!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Oh piffle! I don't believe you. Erbie loves me!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 웃기고 있네요! 안 믿어요. 어브는 날 사랑해요!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I don't want Erbie thinking that, no! I... all right, I'll give his ring back.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 어브가 그렇게 생각하는 건 싫어요! 저는... 좋아요, 반지 돌려줄게요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> Well, he's being silly then. He should know better. I love Erbie and Erbie loves me and that's that!
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 글쎄, 그건 바보 같은 생각이에요. 더 잘 알아야지. 난 어브를 사랑하고 어브도 날 사랑해요. 그게 전부예요!

TextEng: Then get out! This conversation is over!
Text: 그럼 나가세요! 대화는 끝이에요!

TextEng: That's better. And you can take the damned ring! I don't want it anymore.
Text: 그게 낫네요. 그 망할 반지 가져가세요! 더 이상 원치 않아요.

TextEng: That's better.
Text: 그게 낫네요.

TextEng: Aieee! Thug! Ruffian!! Guards, help me!!
Text: 악! 깡패! 불량배!! 경비원, 도와줘요!!

TextEng: I... I... fine! If Erbie wants to send some brutish <man/woman> to steal my ring, then you can have it!
Text: 저... 저... 좋아요! 어브가 무식한 놈을 보내서 반지를 훔치려 한다면, 가져가요!

TextEng: I... I... fine! If Erbie wants to send some brutish <man/woman> to steal my ring, then you can have it!
Text: 저... 저... 좋아요! 어브가 무식한 놈을 보내서 반지를 훔치려 한다면, 가져가요!

TextEng: Hmph. Are you going to apologize or not?
Text: 흥. 사과할 거예요, 안 할 거예요?

TextEng: What -? Where is it? My ring is gone! I've been robbed!!!
Text: 뭐...? 어디 갔어? 반지가 없어졌어! 도둑 맞았어!!!

TextEng: You! You were involved in this, weren't you?! Erbie sent you to distract me so someone else could steal it!
Text: 당신! 당신도 한패죠?! 어브가 당신을 보내서 날 정신 팔리게 하고 다른 사람이 훔치게 했구나!

TextEng: For all I know, Erbie may not even have sent you! You could be some... some thief <man/woman>!
Text: 어쩌면 어브가 보낸 것도 아닐지 몰라! 당신은 그냥... 그냥 도둑놈일지도!

TextEng: Well, I'm going to teach you a lesson! Guards!!
Text: 좋아요, 혼내줄게요! 경비원!!

TextEng: I really don't know. It's all such a big mess. My husband had to go out of town on business when it started... I'm sure he'll explain it to me when he comes back.
Text: 정말 모르겠어요. 너무 엉망진창이에요. 남편이 사태가 시작될 때 사업차 도시를 떠나셨어요... 돌아오시면 설명해 주실 거예요.

TextEng: Well... a good lady-friend of mine wanted to start a cult to Sune, once. Does that count?
Text: 글쎄요... 친한 친구 중 한 명이 예전에 수니 교단을 만들고 싶어 한 적 있어요. 그것도 해당돼요?

TextEng: (giggle!) I really don't know my way around the city. My coachman would know... but he was killed days ago, alas.
Text: (킥킥!) 전 정말 도시 지리를 잘 몰라요. 마부가 알겠지만... 아쉽게도 며칠 전에 죽었어요.

TextEng: Lady Jadale
Text: 자데일 부인

TextEng: I said we didn't have anything more to discuss, didn't I? I assume you know where the door is?
Text: 더 할 얘기 없다고 말씀드렸을텐데요? 문이 어딘지는 아시겠죠?
